Main pronunciation 主要发音: cí

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning refuse.

English senses 英语理解: words, speech, expression, phrase

Usage example 用法举例: 言辭 yán cí (ones words;what one says)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1047

Shuowen 说文解字: 不受也從辛從受受辛宜辤之

辤字的基本解释

辤
cí
同“辞”。

辤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cí］
［《廣韻》似兹切，平之，邪。］
“辞1”的繁体字。“辝1”的今字。亦作“辤1”。
(1)诉讼的供词。
(2)解说，辩解。
(3)文词；言词。
(4)特指王命。
(5)借口，口实。
(6)中国古代逻辑名词。指命题（判断）。
(7)告知，告诉。
(8)记载，记录。
(9)告别，辞别。
(10)遣去，辞退。
(11)推辞；辞谢。
(12)责备；抱怨。
(13)道歉，请求宽恕。
(14)古代的一种文体。

辤字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辛字部】　辤； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1251第15
同辭。【說文】不受也。从辛从受。受卽爲辛，宜辤之也。　又與文辭之辭通用。【魏志·楊修傳】絕妙好辤。

辤字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

辤字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Yin
cí
Same as "ci".
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cí］
["Guangyun" is like a cut, flat and evil. ]
The traditional characters of "Ci 1". The present word for "辝1". Also known as "辤1".
(1) The confession of the lawsuit.
(2) Interpretation, justification.
(3) Words; words.
(4) Especially referring to Wang Ming.
(5) Excuses, eloquence.
(6) Ancient Chinese logical terms. Refers to the proposition (judgment).
(7) Tell, tell.
(8) Record, record.
(9) Farewell, farewell.
(10) Repatriation, dismissal.
(11) Declining; resigning thanks.
(12) Blame; complain.
(13) Apologize and ask for forgiveness.
(14) An ancient style.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Xin Zi Department] 　辤; Kangxi strokes: 15; page number: page 1251 15
Same speech. [Said the text] It is not acceptable. Cong Xin Cong Shou. To receive 卽 is to be pungent, and it is appropriate to be stubborn.　It is also common with literary words. 【Biography of Wei Zhi·Yang Xiu】Excellent and good-natured.
